recommend.title: Tuol Sleng Genocide Museum
recommend.infor: Feel the solemnity of Cambodia's past at the Tuol Sleng Genocide Museum

recommend.title: Banon
recommend.infor: The most beautiful place in Battambang city

recommend.title: Wat Phnom
recommend.infor: Wat Phnom is a historic Buddhist temple located in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, serving as a symbol of the city's founding and spirituality

recommend.title: Royal Palace
recommend.infor: The Royal Palace in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, is a symbol of the monarchy and the official residence of the King. Known for its stunning Khmer architecture and the iconic Silver Pagoda

recommend.title: Mekong rivers
recommend.infor: Enjoy a selection of beverages, witness the spectacular skyline, and see this city from a totally unique vantage point

recommend.title: Tonle Sap
recommend.infor: Experience the beauty of Cambodia with this sunset cruise

recommend.title: Factory Phnom Penh
recommend.infor: A fantastic place the old Levi factory converted into an art space

recommend.title: Win Win Memorial
recommend.infor: The Win-Win Memorial is a monument that marks the end of civil wars in Cambodia and through then Prime Minister Hun Sen's Win-Win policy

recommend.title: Wat Langka
recommend.infor: Nice wat close to the Independance Monument but by now you have probably seen enough wats to take a photo and go elsewhere

recommend.title: Oudong Temples
recommend.infor: Oudong Temples are ancient Buddhist temples in Cambodia, offering a spiritual and historically rich experience.

recommend.title: Angkor Wat
recommend.infor: Angkor Wat stands as a breathtaking testament to human ingenuity, with its awe-inspiring architecture, intricate carvings, and majestic scale that continue to mesmerize visitors from around the world

recommend.title: Angkor Thom
recommend.infor: Angkor Thom astonishes with its monumental stone gates, the iconic faces of Bayon temple, and a vast complex that showcases the grandeur of the Khmer Empire

recommend.title: Taprohm
recommend.infor: Ta Prohm amazes with its mystical allure, as ancient stone structures intertwine with towering trees, creating a mesmerizing and otherworldly atmosphere.

recommend.title: Phnom Tamoa Zoological park
recommend.infor: Phnom Tamao Wildlife Sanctuary amazes with its stunning natural beauty and diverse wildlife, providing a remarkable experience for nature lovers

recommend.title: Kirirom National Park
recommend.infor: Kirirom National Park amazes with its stunning landscapes, lush forests, and serene lakes, creating a captivating haven of natural beauty

recommend.title: Phnom Chisor
recommend.infor: Phnom Chisor astonishes with its ancient hilltop temple, offering breathtaking views and a captivating sense of spirituality

recommend.title: Prasith and Reap Temples
recommend.infor: Prasith and Reap Temples amaze with intricate architecture, sacred ambiance, and profound historical significance, enchanting visitors with a captivating journey

recommend.title: Killing Fields
recommend.infor: The Killing Fields in Phnom Penh: a haunting memorial to the victims of the Khmer Rouge, a stark reminder of a tragic past

recommend.title: Dinart
recommend.infor: DinArt Gallery features the work of contemporary Khmer artist. His signature Apsara images are widely known within Cambodia and in Europe

recommend.title: Otres Beach
recommend.infor: Otres Beach amazes with its pristine sands, turquoise waters, and tranquil ambiance, offering a blissful seaside retreat

recommend.title: Kbal Chhay Waterfalls
recommend.infor: Kbal Chay is a tiered waterfall with a 14-metre drop that's actually one of the major sources of freshwater for the city of Sihanoukville
